title: One Skateboard Company - FAIR GAME
description: Skater owned and operated One Skateboard Company, out of Philadelphia, PA, spends 30 days recording for this promo video which also welcomes John Carson into the fold.

title: J'suis Pas Ben
description: With the help of his friends, filmmaker Ben Chadourne becomes the subject of one of his videos. Filmed by Paul Grund, Augustin Giovannoni, Valentin Jutant, Kevin Rodrigues, Valentin Ferreira and Romain Batard.

description:
Additional Filmers: Victor Campillo, Malo Simonet, Branden Wren, Thibault Le Nours. 

Filmed in San Francisco, Vancouver, and LA.

title: Burden of Dreams
description: Burden of Dreams is the 2020 all VX1000 epic which follows Mike Mag throughout his guerrilla skate trip down the Amazon River by boat.  This video was the result of one month of skating, filming, and exploring the amazonian cities of Manaus, Santarem, and Belem in a futile "man vs mother nature" attempt to film a skate video.

title: Slug Wizards
description: "The Wizards crew is a group of young Vancouver transplants from all over Canada who came together in search of crusty pools, big rails, DIY spots, and cold beers. "Slug Wizards" is their latest offering full of the above and then some." -King Skateboard Magazine

title: Spitfire - Stoking The Fire
description: Frigid winter weather sends Jimmy Wilkins and friends indoors to skateparks in the midwest.

title: Independent - Street Assassin Justin Sommer RAW AMS Part
description:
Berlin's finest Justin Sommer hits hard across Europe with a mix bag of tricks in his RAW AMs Part from Independent Trucks.

Filmed By: Dan Schulz, Julius Krappe, Dennis Ludwig, Torsten Frank.

soundtracks.track: F.C.F the Team - In the Field

title: The Saudade Express
description: The third adventure of the series; The Saudade Express follows Mike Mag on a voyage by train across Brazil. The result of three months of guerrilla style skate trips, filming missions, and train hopping. The Saudade Express released September 11 2021 via DVD and Free Skateboard Magazine. The film screened at the 10th annual Vladimir Film Festival.

soundtracks.track: Novos Baianos - Um Bilhete Pra Didi
Julie London - No Moon At All
Tim Maia & Elis Regina - These Are The Songs

title: Politic - Blew By You
description: Promo video from Politic skateboards, featuring Japhey Dow's first appearance for the company since turning pro. Filmers: Adam Bos, Kevin Delgrosso, Corey Rosson, Michael Breitmaier, Martin Wilson, Cameron Dumaine, Logan Matthews, Nick Kassebaum, Thomas Purtell.

title: Magenta - Magentapes
description:
VX collection of the team's local sessions from the lockdown streets of Paris, Bordeaux, London, Melbourne, Milan, SF, Tokyo, Stockholm, Tampa and a few more.

Featuring Casey Foley, Morgan Campbell, Glen Fox, Soy Panday, Vivien Feil, Ruben Spelta, Gunes Ozdogan, Shogo Zama, Leo Valls, Jimmy Lannon, Jesse Narvaez, Ben Gore & Jameel Douglas.

Filmed by Kyota Kamei, Zach Chamberlain, Eddie Claire, Ryan Flores, Stephen Buggica, Marshall Nicolson, Clement Harpillard, and others.
